channel.title: Problems with my Server
channel.description: Well, i changed on the "Client side" on "Client" the IP: 127.0.0.1 to *My No-IP* After that i .rar it, and uploaded, but my friend said: Error connecting server. Please someone help me.

item.title: Problems with my Server
item.dc:creator: @Junes Junes
item.description:
@Junes wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:2, topic:364159”]1. You have to portfoward correctly.
2. You have to be running the server.
3. You have to compile the client after changing something.[/quote]

i helped him

#4 if you cant help but state errors dont bother because it was neither of that lot it was his signlink file in his client

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with my Server
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

  1. You have to portfoward correctly.
  2. You have to be running the server.
  3. You have to compile the client after changing something.
